T.query: select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where sg.parent_id = 239 or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.close_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id =657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1'  or sg.is_production = 't';

F.query: select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where sg.parent_id = 284 or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.close_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id =657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1'  or sg.is_production = 't';

select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where sg.parent_id != 239 or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.close_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id =657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1'  or sg.is_production = 't';

select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where (sg.parent_id = 239 and sg.oid='dce') or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.close_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id =657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1'  or sg.is_production = 't';

select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where sg.parent_id = 239 or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.live_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id =657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1'  or sg.is_production = 't';

select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where sg.parent_id = 239 or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.close_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id =657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1';

select sg.id as sgid, s.id as sid, d.id as did from medidata_studies as sg join studies as s on sg.id = s.external_id JOIN depots d on d.study_id = s.id  where sg.parent_id = 239 or sg.name ='Mediflexs' or sg.protocol='Mediflex UAT Protocol' or sg.live_date>'2015-01-01' or s.study_design_id !=657 or s.name = 'NandanStudy' or s.file_upload_rules='1' or sg.is_production = 't';
